_header: All hail Mary and well you be
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, songs in honour of
_description: ‘Salue sancta parens’, a carol — five quatrains (abab) with refrain and burden, ‘Salue sancta parens’

GULHun83.First Lines:
All heyle Mary and well þou beMadyn & moder with outyn
                    offens…
GULHun83.Last Lines:
…Kepe vs well that we note fallSalue Sancta
                    parens
GULHun83.Note: Fifth stanza added by a later hand.
